post.text: A young girl asked Hillary, "Do you think when you're president, you'll be paid as much as a man?"

comment.author: John
comment.text: Hillary you should be in prison. But because your husband was a president you are free...

replies.author: Zachary
replies.text: For what should we imprison her?

replies.author: Mckenna
replies.text: hate much? have a better day

replies.author: Madison
replies.text: Stop listening to Fox News it's all lies!!!

replies.author: Alexandra
replies.text: En serio?, Y como explicas sobre Panama Papers de Trump?. El lavado de dinero de Trump, y no pagar los servicios a la gente, y fraude a la los universitarios de University Trump?. Esto no es carcel?
